20 #include "QtDcm.h"
21 #include <QtDcmPatient.h>
22 #include <QtDcmStudy.h>

30 class QtDcmPrivate
31 {
32 
33 public:
34  int mode;
35  QList<QString> imagesList;
36  QString currentSerieId;
37  QDate beginDate, endDate;
38  QMap<QString, QList<QString> > selectedSeries;
39 };
40 
41 QtDcm::QtDcm ( QWidget *parent ) : QWidget ( parent ), d ( new QtDcmPrivate )
42 {
43  QTextCodec::setCodecForCStrings ( QTextCodec::codecForName ( "iso" ) );
44  setupUi ( this );
45  d->mode = QtDcm::CD;
46 
47  //Initialize QTreeWidgetPatients
48  treeWidgetPatients->setColumnWidth ( 0, 400 );
49  treeWidgetPatients->setColumnWidth ( 1, 100 );
50  treeWidgetPatients->setColumnWidth ( 2, 100 );
51  QStringList labelsPatients;
52  labelsPatients << "Patients name" << "ID" << "Birthdate" << "Sex";
53  treeWidgetPatients->setHeaderLabels ( labelsPatients );
54  treeWidgetPatients->setContextMenuPolicy ( Qt::CustomContextMenu );
55 
56  //Initialize QTreeWidgetSeries
57  treeWidgetStudies->setColumnWidth ( 0, 200 );
58  treeWidgetStudies->setColumnWidth ( 1, 100 );
59  QStringList labelsStudies;
60  labelsStudies << "Studies description" << "Date" << "ID";
61  treeWidgetStudies->setHeaderLabels ( labelsStudies );
62  treeWidgetStudies->setContextMenuPolicy ( Qt::CustomContextMenu );
63 
64  //Initialize QTreeWidgetSeries
65  treeWidgetSeries->setColumnWidth ( 0, 230 );
66  treeWidgetSeries->setColumnWidth ( 1, 100 );
67  treeWidgetSeries->setColumnWidth ( 2, 100 );
68  QStringList labelsSeries;
69  labelsSeries << "Series description" << "Modality" << "Date" << "ID";
70  treeWidgetSeries->setHeaderLabels ( labelsSeries );
71  treeWidgetSeries->setContextMenuPolicy ( Qt::CustomContextMenu );
72 
73  //Initialize widgets
74  startDateEdit->setDate ( QDate ( 1900, 01, 01 ) );
75  endDateEdit->setDate ( QDate::currentDate() );
76 
77  QtDcmManager::instance()->setPatientsTreeWidget ( treeWidgetPatients );
78  QtDcmManager::instance()->setStudiesTreeWidget ( treeWidgetStudies );
79  QtDcmManager::instance()->setSeriesTreeWidget ( treeWidgetSeries );
80 
81  QtDcmManager::instance()->setDate1 ( startDateEdit->date().toString ( "yyyyMMdd" ) );
82  QtDcmManager::instance()->setDate2 ( endDateEdit->date().toString ( "yyyyMMdd" ) );
83 
84  initConnections();
85 }
86 
87 QtDcm::~QtDcm()
88 {
89  QtDcmManager::instance()->deleteTemporaryDirs();
90 
91  delete d;
92  d = NULL;
93 }
94 
95 void QtDcm::initConnections()
96 {
97  // Initialize connections
98  QObject::connect ( treeWidgetPatients, SIGNAL ( currentItemChanged ( QTreeWidgetItem*, QTreeWidgetItem* ) ), this, SLOT ( patientItemSelected ( QTreeWidgetItem*, QTreeWidgetItem* ) ) );
99  QObject::connect ( treeWidgetStudies, SIGNAL ( currentItemChanged ( QTreeWidgetItem*, QTreeWidgetItem* ) ), this, SLOT ( studyItemSelected ( QTreeWidgetItem*, QTreeWidgetItem* ) ) );
100  QObject::connect ( treeWidgetSeries, SIGNAL ( currentItemChanged ( QTreeWidgetItem*, QTreeWidgetItem* ) ), this, SLOT ( serieItemSelected ( QTreeWidgetItem*, QTreeWidgetItem* ) ) );
101  QObject::connect ( treeWidgetSeries, SIGNAL ( itemClicked ( QTreeWidgetItem*, int ) ), this, SLOT ( serieItemClicked ( QTreeWidgetItem*, int ) ) );
102  QObject::connect ( nameEdit, SIGNAL ( textChanged ( QString ) ), this, SLOT ( patientNameTextChanged ( QString ) ) );
103  QObject::connect ( serieDescriptionEdit, SIGNAL ( textChanged ( QString ) ), this, SLOT ( serieDescriptionTextChanged ( QString ) ) );
104  QObject::connect ( studyDescriptionEdit, SIGNAL ( textChanged ( QString ) ), this, SLOT ( studyDescriptionTextChanged ( QString ) ) );
105  QObject::connect ( searchButton, SIGNAL ( clicked() ), this, SLOT ( findSCU() ) );
106  QObject::connect ( cdromButton, SIGNAL ( clicked() ), this, SLOT ( openDicomdir() ) );
107  QObject::connect ( patientSexComboBox, SIGNAL ( currentIndexChanged ( int ) ), this, SLOT ( updateSex ( int ) ) );
108  QObject::connect ( serieModalityComboBox, SIGNAL ( currentIndexChanged ( int ) ), this, SLOT ( updateModality ( int ) ) );
109  QObject::connect ( pacsComboBox, SIGNAL ( currentIndexChanged ( int ) ), this, SLOT ( updatePACS ( int ) ) );
110  QObject::connect ( startDateEdit, SIGNAL ( dateChanged ( QDate ) ), this, SLOT ( startDateChanged ( QDate ) ) );
111  QObject::connect ( endDateEdit, SIGNAL ( dateChanged ( QDate ) ), this, SLOT ( endDateChanged ( QDate ) ) );
112 }
113 
114 void QtDcm::updatePacsComboBox()
115 {
116  pacsComboBox->blockSignals ( true );
117  pacsComboBox->clear();
118 
119  for ( int i = 0; i < QtDcmPreferences::instance()->getServers().size(); i++ )
120  pacsComboBox->addItem ( QtDcmPreferences::instance()->getServers().at ( i )->getName() );
121  pacsComboBox->blockSignals ( false );
122 }
123 
124 void QtDcm::findSCU()
125 {
126  d->mode = QtDcm::PACS;
127  treeWidgetPatients->clear();
128  treeWidgetStudies->clear();
129  treeWidgetSeries->clear();
130  QtDcmManager::instance()->setCurrentPacs ( pacsComboBox->currentIndex() );
131  QtDcmManager::instance()->findPatientsScu();
132 }
133 
134 void QtDcm::clearDisplay()
135 {
136  treeWidgetPatients->clear();
137  treeWidgetStudies->clear();
138  treeWidgetSeries->clear();
139 }
140 
141 void QtDcm::patientItemSelected ( QTreeWidgetItem* current, QTreeWidgetItem* previous )
142 {
143  QtDcmManager::instance()->clearSerieInfo();
144  QtDcmManager::instance()->clearPreview();
145 
146  treeWidgetStudies->clear();
147 
148  if ( current != 0 ) // Avoid crash when clearDisplay is called
149  {
150  if ( d->mode == QtDcm::PACS )
151  QtDcmManager::instance()->findStudiesScu ( current->text ( 0 ) );
152  else
153  QtDcmManager::instance()->findStudiesDicomdir ( current->text ( 0 ) );
154 
155  QtDcmManager::instance()->clearPreview();
156  }
157 }
158 
159 void QtDcm::studyItemSelected ( QTreeWidgetItem* current, QTreeWidgetItem* previous )
160 {
161  treeWidgetSeries->clear();
162 
163  QtDcmManager::instance()->clearSerieInfo();
164  QtDcmManager::instance()->clearPreview();
165 
166  if ( current != 0 ) // Avoid crash when clearDisplay is called
167  {
168  if ( d->mode == QtDcm::PACS )
169  QtDcmManager::instance()->findSeriesScu ( treeWidgetPatients->currentItem()->text ( 0 ), current->data ( 2, 0 ).toString() );
170  else
171  QtDcmManager::instance()->findSeriesDicomdir ( treeWidgetPatients->currentItem()->text ( 0 ), current->data ( 2, 0 ).toString() );
172 
173  QtDcmManager::instance()->clearPreview();
174  }
175 }
176 
177 void QtDcm::serieItemSelected ( QTreeWidgetItem* current, QTreeWidgetItem* previous )
178 {
179  if ( current != 0 ) // Avoid crash when clearDisplay is called
180  {
181  QtDcmManager::instance()->clearListImages();
182 
183  if ( d->mode == QtDcm::CD )
184  QtDcmManager::instance()->findImagesDicomdir ( current->text ( 3 ) );
185  else
186  QtDcmManager::instance()->findImagesScu ( current->text ( 3 ) );
187 
188  int elementCount = QtDcmManager::instance()->getListImages().size();
189  QString institution = current->data ( 5, 0 ).toString();
190  QString opName = current->data ( 6, 0 ).toString();
191 
192  QtDcmManager::instance()->updateSerieInfo ( QString::number ( elementCount ), institution, opName );
193 // QtDcmManager::instance()->clearPreview();
194  QtDcmManager::instance()->getPreviewFromSelectedSerie ( current->text ( 3 ), elementCount / 2 );
195  }
196 }
197 
198 void QtDcm::serieItemClicked ( QTreeWidgetItem * item, int column )
199 {
200  if ( item->checkState ( 0 ) == Qt::Checked )
201  QtDcmManager::instance()->addSerieToImport ( item->text ( 3 ) );
202  else
203  QtDcmManager::instance()->removeSerieToImport ( item->text ( 3 ) );
204 }
205 
206 void QtDcm::openDicomdir()
207 {
208  this->clearDisplay();
209  d->mode = QtDcm::CD;
210  // Open a QFileDialog for choosing a Dicomdir
211  QFileDialog * dialog = new QFileDialog( this );
212  dialog->setFileMode ( QFileDialog::ExistingFile );
213  dialog->setDirectory ( QDir::home().dirName() );
214  dialog->setWindowTitle ( tr ( "Open dicomdir" ) );
215  QStringList filters;
216  filters << "Dicomdir files (dicomdir* DICOMDIR*)";
217  filters << "Any files (*)";
218  dialog->setNameFilters(filters);
219 
220  QString fileName;
221 
222  if ( dialog->exec() )
223  {
224  fileName = dialog->selectedFiles() [0];
225  }
226 
227  dialog->close();
228 
229  if ( !fileName.isEmpty() ) // A file has been chosen
230  {
231  if (QString::compare(fileName, "dicomdir", Qt::CaseInsensitive))
232  {
233  QtDcmManager::instance()->setDicomdir ( fileName );
234  this->loadPatientsFromDicomdir();
235  }
236  }
237 
238  dialog->deleteLater();
239 }
240 
241 void QtDcm::loadPatientsFromDicomdir()
242 {
243  this->clearDisplay();
244  QtDcmManager::instance()->loadDicomdir();
245 }
246 
247 void QtDcm::queryPACS()
248 {
249  this->findSCU();
250 }
251 
252 void QtDcm::updateModality ( int index )
253 {
254  switch ( index )
255  {
256 
257  case 0://*
258  QtDcmManager::instance()->setModality ( "*" );
259  break;
260 
261  case 1://MR
262  QtDcmManager::instance()->setModality ( "MR" );
263  break;
264 
265  case 2://CT
266  QtDcmManager::instance()->setModality ( "CT" );
267  break;
268 
269  case 3://PET
270  QtDcmManager::instance()->setModality ( "PET" );
271  break;
272  }
273 
274  treeWidgetSeries->clear();
275 
276  if ( treeWidgetPatients->currentItem() && treeWidgetStudies->currentItem() )
277  {
278  if ( d->mode == QtDcm::PACS )
279  QtDcmManager::instance()->findSeriesScu ( treeWidgetPatients->currentItem()->text ( 0 ), treeWidgetStudies->currentItem()->data ( 2, 0 ).toString() );
280  else
281  QtDcmManager::instance()->findSeriesDicomdir ( treeWidgetPatients->currentItem()->text ( 0 ), treeWidgetStudies->currentItem()->data ( 2, 0 ).toString() );
282  }
283 }
284 
285 void QtDcm::updateSex ( int index )
286 {
287  switch ( index )
288  {
289 
290  case 0://all
291  QtDcmManager::instance()->setPatientSex ( "*" );
292  this->queryPACS();
293  break;
294 
295  case 1://M
296  QtDcmManager::instance()->setPatientSex ( "M" );
297  this->queryPACS();
298  break;
299 
300  case 2://F
301  QtDcmManager::instance()->setPatientSex ( "F" );
302  this->queryPACS();
303  }
304 }
305 
306 void QtDcm::updatePACS ( int index )
307 {
308  QtDcmManager::instance()->setCurrentPacs ( index );
309  this->findSCU();
310 }
311 
312 void QtDcm::startDateChanged ( QDate date )
313 {
314  if ( date > endDateEdit->date() )
315  {
316  date = endDateEdit->date();
317  startDateEdit->setDate ( date );
318  return;
319  }
320 
321  QtDcmManager::instance()->setDate1 ( date.toString ( "yyyyMMdd" ) );
322 
323  treeWidgetStudies->clear();
324  treeWidgetSeries->clear();
325 
326  if ( treeWidgetPatients->currentItem() )
327  {
328  if ( d->mode == QtDcm::PACS )
329  QtDcmManager::instance()->findStudiesScu ( treeWidgetPatients->currentItem()->text ( 0 ) );
330  else
331  qDebug() << "recherche sur le cd";
332  }
333 }
334 
335 void QtDcm::endDateChanged ( QDate date )
336 {
337  if ( date < startDateEdit->date() )
338  {
339  date = startDateEdit->date();
340  endDateEdit->setDate ( date );
341  return;
342  }
343 
344  QtDcmManager::instance()->setDate2 ( date.toString ( "yyyyMMdd" ) );
345 
346  treeWidgetStudies->clear();
347  treeWidgetSeries->clear();
348 
349  if ( treeWidgetPatients->currentItem() )
350  {
351  if ( d->mode == QtDcm::PACS )
352  QtDcmManager::instance()->findStudiesScu ( treeWidgetPatients->currentItem()->text ( 0 ) );
353  else
354  qDebug() << "recherche sur le cd";
355  }
356 }
357 
358 void QtDcm::editPreferences()
359 {
360  //Launch a dialog window for editing PACS settings
361  QtDcmPreferencesDialog * dialog = new QtDcmPreferencesDialog ( this );
362  dialog->getWidget()->setPreferences ( QtDcmPreferences::instance() );
363  dialog->setPreferences ( QtDcmPreferences::instance() );
364 
365  if ( dialog->exec() )
366  {
367  dialog->getWidget()->updatePreferences();
368  dialog->updatePreferences();
369 // this->updatePacsComboBox();
370  }
371  dialog->close();
372  delete dialog;
373 }
374 
375 void QtDcm::patientNameTextChanged ( QString name )
376 {
377  if ( name.isEmpty() )
378  QtDcmManager::instance()->setPatientName ( "*" );
379  else
380  QtDcmManager::instance()->setPatientName ( name + "*" );
381 
382  if ( d->mode == QtDcm::PACS )
383  this->findSCU();
384 }
385 
386 void QtDcm::studyDescriptionTextChanged ( QString desc )
387 {
388  if ( desc.isEmpty() )
389  QtDcmManager::instance()->setStudyDescription ( "*" );
390  else
391  QtDcmManager::instance()->setStudyDescription ( "*" + desc + "*" );
392 
393  if ( d->mode == QtDcm::PACS )
394  {
395  treeWidgetStudies->clear();
396  treeWidgetSeries->clear();
397  }
398  if ( treeWidgetPatients->currentItem() )
399  {
400  if ( d->mode == QtDcm::PACS )
401  QtDcmManager::instance()->findStudiesScu ( treeWidgetPatients->currentItem()->text ( 0 ) );
402  }
403 }
404 
405 void QtDcm::serieDescriptionTextChanged ( QString desc )
406 {
407  if ( desc.isEmpty() )
408  {
409  QtDcmManager::instance()->setSerieDescription ( "*" );
410  }
411  else
412  QtDcmManager::instance()->setSerieDescription ( "*" + desc + "*" );
413 
414  if ( d->mode == QtDcm::PACS )
415  treeWidgetSeries->clear();
416 
417  if ( treeWidgetPatients->currentItem() && treeWidgetStudies->currentItem() )
418  {
419  if ( d->mode == QtDcm::PACS )
420  QtDcmManager::instance()->findSeriesScu ( treeWidgetPatients->currentItem()->text ( 0 ), treeWidgetStudies->currentItem()->data ( 2, 0 ).toString() );
421  }
422 }
